attributes.action: help find the poor child sahil saeed in pakistan and the british government should help as he is also british
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the british government has not at all helped in the search to find the young british born child sahil saeed who has been kidnapped in pakistan. 
this is disgusting and should not be treated different to "white british" person who would go missing in a foreign country.
and why is his family getting blamed for this disgusting incident. his mother is here crying for the safe being of her child, father is there weeping his eyes out just to get a glimps of his child and the british government has the nerve to sit back and say that the family should be blamed.
you should be ashamed. just say that you cant be bothered. you should be ashamed of you actions and do someting to help find this poor child!!!!
send people out there to investigate with the pakistani government as you have done before and not treat this as anything different.
please help!!!

rejection.details: This case cannot be commented on at this time.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
